website_summaries.verdict: With this portable pet-themed set, young doctors can care for patients anytime, anywhere. A great choice for animal lovers and aspiring vets.
pros: Comes with lots of realistic features and fun accessories, including a talking stethoscope, a light and sound patient panel, an EKG reader, and more, making play time all the more convincing
Folding design, wheels, and a handle allow little ones to care for patients on-the-go
cons: Only comes with patient Fido, despite also having a cat displayed on the box

customer_reviews.title: Does not come with kitten...
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old granddaughter wanted this after watching commercials of it. We were dissapointed when we got it because although it shows a kitten on the box it actually only comes with a dog. But she is still enjoying playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Vachon

customer_reviews.title: Will not stay upright unless it is leaning against something for support
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy , but it constantly tips over , you have to have it leaning up against something in order for it stay upright. We have also had a few finger pinches closing the doors.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Battery compartment and On/off Switch located under pink panel
customer_reviews.text: Unpack and place batteries in this toy before giving it as it takes a while. At least it did for this grandmother. Cute toy and it was a request but won't know until Christmas if it will be a hit.
customer_reviews.author: Connie M

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking toy with a battery box too difficult to get open to install batteries.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in October for my granddaughter‘s birthday December 4th. We opened it December 3 to get ready for her party and the box was all greasy. To our surprise this toy had already gone to another home and the screws for batteries box we’re stripped. Amazon gave us a hassle because It was past the return time. What about Christmas Eve When parents open this toy and find they can’t get the screw out of the battery case? All the toys will be sold out and the children will not have a toy!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Parry

customer_reviews.title: not for MSRP
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected, not worth its MSRP price. Went down to $9 on clearance at Walmart after holidays
customer_reviews.author: Hernandez Fam

customer_reviews.title: So cute and my daughter loves it! Just don’t look for the cat on the box!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this, however, asks me daily about the cat that is pictured on the box! It is not included nor is it available to purchase. This alone makes me want to hate this toy, however, it is really really cute. Picturing a toy cat that you can’t purchase was a huge mistak though.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2One

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: Nicely compact size Required aa batteries that are hidden under top portion directly over the tub. Lots of plastic dog treats that. Wish they sold replacable treats . . So far its not annoying. .. And easy to stuff away
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. They come with little treats that she loves to pretend with. The only complaint I would have would be the ekg is paper and is very easy to rip and then will not function correctly.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a four year old. She literally played with it for hours and loved the little dog that came with it. The only thing that I did not realize is that batteries are not included. Luckily, I had some at my house already. I highly recommend this for small kids. Even the boys enjoyed playing with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Good product and my daughter loves it but the picture is misleading
customer_reviews.text: The product is really nice and my daughter loves it but the product picture shows a cat which isn't in the product and the box is a cardboard so that you know. Initially I thought this might have been a returned product but after looking into reviews I saw couple with a cardboard box.
customer_reviews.author: Kratos

customer_reviews.title: Another winner
customer_reviews.text: Just as sturdy as the other Doc McStuffins toys I've purchased this year. This gets regular use by my daughter who is 4. We just found the compartment for the batteries (2 mo ths after christmas haha) and the lights and sounds are entertaining as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yr old granddaughter is a huge Doc McStuffins fan and she absolutely loved this. The only issue was the 2 little plastic pieces at the bottom of the doors broke off, so the doors didn't stay shut as securely. The top ones were fine so those held the doors shut. We just had to superglue those 2 pieces so they would stay in.
customer_reviews.author: cahill

customer_reviews.title: Broken! Don’t buy!
customer_reviews.text: This came broken. I had saved it for a surprise and was so upset and my kid was so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Late Enough

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy that's easy to drag around the house
customer_reviews.text: My kiddo loves dragging this around. It does make a little bit of wheel noise, but that could be 3-year-old user-error too. The sound isn't too annoying, either, which is nice. Wish it came with a few more animals, but you can use whatever you have as a "patient."
customer_reviews.author: WellYes

customer_reviews.title: Portable fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old granddaughter takes this everywhere with her! She can take is easily to brother's football practice or the sitter. All the other kids want to play with it too. Comes with pieces that all fit inside.
customer_reviews.author: Janine M. Friend

customer_reviews.title: Battery Compartment Defect
customer_reviews.text: Compartment with battery had a screw that’s would not come out and stripped within the first attempt. It was a gift from Santa and thus we were disappointed because we didn’t put attempt to put them in before Santa gifted it. My daughter plays with it without the battery functions and still loves it without it. After reading others with the same problem it seems to be a defect of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: My little girl got this for Christmas and absolutely loves it. She loves all the sounds and buttons and interaction with taking care of her pets and baby dolls.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: I wish it had volume control
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got this for Christmas. She loves it I cannot stand that there is no volume control. I'm thinking whoever came up with it hates parents lol. The paper roll was ripped on the first day of use. Paper doesn't hold up too well to toddlers. Otherwise it's a great toy. I did get it on black Friday sale. I'd say it's not worth full price but what I paid for it I'm ok with
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece for Christmas and she loves it. She played with it all day and her mom told me she has been playing with it non-stop since. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian P.

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment for 3 year old.
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my 3 year old. We’re in February and she still plays with it daily. Definitely a success since she gets tired of toys so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jorgelina

customer_reviews.title: Big hit for 4 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my niece's 4th birthday and it was a HUGE hit amongst all her friends. My own daughter has been talking about it for the past couple months now and is requesting it for her upcoming 3rd birthday. I think this would be appropriate for any kid ages 3 - 6.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I'm very disappointed..I went to install the batteries and couldn't get the screw out..the screw would turn but wouldn't come out..on Christmas day I gave my granddaughter a toy that didn't work..
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for xmas for our 4-year-old daughter and it's summer and she still plays with it regularly. Super sturdy and full of fun things to do inside. We also bought the doc bag kit which was a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: CAT

customer_reviews.title: Love this toy!
customer_reviews.text: This product was well made, all parts were included. Once put together we had to stand back when my granddaughter was it. She loves it. She plays with it constantly and that means a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: A must for Doc McStuffins fans
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this thing. She plays Doctor Stuffins all the time and this has really brought it all together.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Piazza

customer_reviews.title: Not much going on here
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was lacking, and my daughter gets bored playing with it pretty quickly, which I understand completely.
customer_reviews.author: Matty P

customer_reviews.title: SMALL but cute
customer_reviews.text: my daughter is a tall five. The size if this is better for a 2 to 3 year old. Lots of interaction, light and so on.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect no issues 3.5 yr old girl has loved it
customer_reviews.text: What 3.5 year old granddaughter wouldn’t love this ... came nicely packaged was Christmas gift. She was so excited has been playing non stop with it. It pulls nicely when closed. Needs batteries but when added works well - no issues thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 star cause you can’t lower down the songs
customer_reviews.text: My kids love all Dr toys, they want them all I got this for Christmas and they love it, only down thing it’s that you can’t lower the Volumen of this it’s Too loud sometimes 👂🏻
customer_reviews.author: Paloma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy for my toddler and would use this seller again!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loooved this and plays with it for hours at a time! Couldn't find better value for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for daughter. She played with it for about 2 weeks before it wound up in the toy box
customer_reviews.author: Tim Merrifield

customer_reviews.title: Over-priced
customer_reviews.text: Constantly falls over. Doors won’t stay open. Not worth $50.... more like $20. Would also be nice if it came with kitten too that’s on the box. Also only 4 things actually make noise.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Cute for a younger child
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 6.5 and really into vet stuff and pretend play. She probably is a little too old for this, but likes to play with it still. Most of the time she turns into the pet and I'm the vet using the toy on her.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Mobile Pet Rescue
customer_reviews.text: The handle does come up, it was really hard to get out the first time; my husband had to figure it out. Bought this for Christmas for our granddaughter who loves Doc McStuffins and she has not stopped playing with it! Great purchase and seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it! I love that everything gets stored inside for easy clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on sale, so it was a great deal! It has so many features and keeps my daughter busy for hours. It also doesn't take up too much space because it closes up.
customer_reviews.author: Barnez

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect it was a little smaller then I thought it would be I should have looked at the measurements though.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Christmas Eve trying to place batteries in my daughters toy from Santa and where the batteries go is defective - the screw is stripped and cannot even open to place the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: Christmas gift 🎄
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift so I can’t review yet. 😊
customer_reviews.author: # 1Nana

customer_reviews.title: My 4 yr old niece loves it!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for my niece as a Christmas present...all I can say is, we won best present! She takes this thing EVERYWHERE!
customer_reviews.author: A. Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: Excellent toy for future veterinarians who love Doc McStuffins
customer_reviews.text: My little girl loved this toy. She enjoys giving all her toys checkups and takes it everywhere she goes.
customer_reviews.author: JO.S

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. It's easy for her to open and close then where around.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Hit and semi miss
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! My four year old that is luckily the size of a five year old can playa with this. She loves it. I really like that she can actually roll it around. However I wish the handle would extend, so my daughter doesn’t have to walk weird while walking around with it. She really loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Randi

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute set. Good quality and lots of little details. My 2 & 5 year old girls love playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer K.

customer_reviews.title: Kids enjoy
customer_reviews.text: My kids love giving their animals and our dog a check up with this toy. Very compact so it doesn't take up as much room as I thought it would
customer_reviews.author: CAS

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great toy, dozens of cool little details and functions. Don't forget to put the batteries in! It brings it to life
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Doc McStuffins
customer_reviews.text: Super fun station my daughters love them. They play doctor everyday lol
customer_reviews.author: Arwendina

customer_reviews.title: My Child Loves It
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, she lit up when I gifted it to her.
customer_reviews.author: Khufu

customer_reviews.title: Loves it
customer_reviews.text: She loves the sounds and imagination she has to save pets

customer_reviews.title: Cute for kids!
customer_reviews.text: My four year old loves this and was so excited to receive on Xmas!

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: So cute grand kids love it comes in one piece

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for the animal or Doc McStuffin lover
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my niece. It was a hit! Such a fun toy. It’s been over a year and she still plays with it!

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great. My niece takes this with her every where she loves it

customer_reviews.title: Good gift!
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loved this, plastic is kind of cheap but otherwise great toy.

customer_reviews.title: My grandaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My 4 year old grandaughter loved it. Excellent price.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a ok toy
customer_reviews.text: She likes the little dog but that was about it. This toy needs more gadgets and sounds.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I thought it would be but very cute! My daughter loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and fun for my three year old. It’s pretty sturdy and well worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Our 4 year old loves it. It’s easy for her to fold up and pull around the house and set back up.

customer_reviews.title: Cute compact toy, but LOUD
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy. It’s well made and durable. The only reason I didn’t give it 5 stars is because it is VERY loud and there isn’t a volume control.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. We purchased this on sell and made one little girl very happy on her birthday !

customer_reviews.title: Not a gift to give for Christmas!!

customer_reviews.title: Love! Super cute
customer_reviews.text: This gift was perfect for my Daughter it came with all th necessities and it’s so cute and convenient on the go! It’s a must have for a doc mcstuffin’s fan!

customer_reviews.title: Quality

customer_reviews.title: If Doc is your kid’s thing, this is a hit

product_meta.title: Doc McStuffins 92446 Baby All in One Nursery Pet Rescue Mobile, Multicolor
product_meta.description: Doc McStuffins 92446 Baby All in One Nursery Pet Rescue Mobile, Multicolor
feature_bullets: It's Doc McStuffins to the Pet Rescue. The newest theme on the acclaimed Disney Junior series, Doc McStuffins, is Pet Rescue With the new Doc McStuffins Pet Rescue Mobile, kids can race to save the pets of McStuffinsville – just like Doc Designed for on the go care, the Pet Rescue Mobile is equipped with lights, music, phrases, and play medical tools and accessories, including a pretend EKG reader, talking stethoscope and light & sound control panel that locates pets in need
Pet Rescue Mobile comes with lights, sounds, music and play medical tools and accessories
Light and sounds control panel helps kids locate toy pets in need
Light up x ray and talking stethoscope helps diagnose boo boos
Give Oliver a bath and help him feel better with play treats

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars454 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
